thread.section_title: Only Kosher Candy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Only Kosher Candy | www.onlykoshercandy.com
thread.title: Dina
thread.title_full: Only Kosher Candy reviewed by Dina

author: Dina
title: Dina
text:
Just wanted to say THANK YOU to 'Only Kosher Candy' company for sending Purim packages to my grandkids in Monsey, USA. I am from Canada, so many of the sites that I tried ordering from could not fill my request as they did not accept a Canadian billing address. (Don't know why??) Since I do not like giving out my credit card number, I was very happy that they also accepted receiving money from my pay pal account. Another Plus!!! In addition, their selection was very appealing, plentiful, as well as their competitive pricing. I was very impressed by that! I have to tell you that my grandkids (ages 3 & 1) LOVED their mishloach manot!! They walked around the house with them and wouldn't put them away. (Candy tray, funny glasses, and candy pacifiers). I will defiantly use this company next year too and of course for any other occasion when I need to send something abroad.
From a very satisfied customer from Toronto, Canada.
Sincerely, Dina Frisch-Israel
